fullText: This backstage comedy about a strip club revue is so busy servicing its eccentric characters that it forgets to be funny.
dtliExcerpt: This backstage comedy about a strip club revue is so busy servicing its eccentric characters that it forgets to be funny.
bwwExcerpt: 'The Performers,' David West Read's romantic comedy about a lovers' showdown at an Adult Film Awards ceremony in Las Vegas, is dopey fun. That's not because the sensibility is raunchy, but because the sentiments are so corny. There's not much to cheer in the thin plot about married porn stars who teach a prudish couple a thing or two about true love and great sex; the big pleasure comes from watching true comic artists spin this trite material into gold.
showScoreExcerpt: This backstage comedy about a strip club revue is so busy servicing its eccentric characters that it forgets to be funny.
